summary:
I am a Data & Analytics Manager with 10+ years of experience in leveraging data and analytics with proven technical and functional skills, and a demonstrated focus and vision on advanced analytics. I have a background in consultancy with proven track record in data analysis & business intelligence, with expertise in using and managing extremely large and complex data sets to gain insights and support business decision making, effectively communicating findings with both technical and business stakeholders.

I hold a bachelor's degree in economics and started my career as Business Analyst and decided to develop my skills in the analytical direction. I worked as a BI consultant in both functional and technical roles for 8+ years.

In 2013 I joined Amgen as Data & Analytics Specialist and gradually grew into a Data & Analytics Manager role in the commercial domain, being responsible for managing overall operations for the EU region initially, and currently for the ELMAC region (Europe, Latin America, Middle East, Africa & Canada), including mentoring and coaching of all technical team members and managing client expectations.

A few things I am passionate about: 

-Delivering high quality data & analytics results to support our business processes and deliver high business value.
-Being people-oriented, trying to help the organization with data & analytics deliverables where and when I can, or connect them to those who can.
-Leading and guiding the team, continuously improving to become the best version of ourselves.

profile_positions.description:
In my current position, I am responsible for managing overall operations for the Data & Analytics capability for the commercial domain in the ELMAC region (Europe, Latin America, Middle East, Africa and Canada), including:

-Mentoring and coaching all technical and functional team members
-Gatekeeper role for evolving the data model for the commercial domain
-Bridge between business stakeholders and technical teams
-Safeguard quality of all deliverables/work streams
-Coordinate all SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) development activities
profile_positions.title: Data & Analytics Manager

profile_positions.description:
When I joined Amgen in 2013, the Data & Analytics capability was scattered across the organization, with much less focus than it has today. In the course of the years, the capability for the commercial domain has drastically matured and I was part of the team that drove the whole transition from decentralized BI solutions to a robust Data & Analytics capability across the entire Elmac region (Europe, Latin America, Middle East, Africa and Canada) and Japac region. 

In my role, I worked on:

-Tool selection and Data & Analytics architecture
-Business requirements gathering
-Datalake modeling
-Tableau dashboard design and development
-Business friendly documentation
-Data quality framework
-Decommissioning of legacy systems
-Onboarding of various source systems on regional and global level, such as Salesforce, Veeva CRM, and SAP
-Onboarding of data sources for the regions and countries across the globe, such as IQVIA market data
profile_positions.title: BI Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Active Professionals is a Business Intelligence consulting firm, tool and technology independent. Among others, Active Professionals is a partner of SAS Visual Analytics and QlikView Elite Solution Partner.
 
Projects include:
 
Veiligheidsregio Gelderland-Zuid | QlikView development/maintenance
 • Maintenance and development on existing applications
 
Aboma | QlikView development/maintenance
 • Design and development of new applications
 • Maintenance and development on existing applications
 
Samsung | Information Analysis
 • Functional design & information analysis
profile_positions.title: BI Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Dink Intelligence is a consulting firm in the field of Intelligence (including Business Intelligence and Competitive Intelligence/Market Intelligence). Dink is tool/vendor independent and helps organizations in various industries to bring their Intelligence activities to the next level.

Projects include:

•	Functional design & information analysis
•	Development of dashboards in existing application

•	Development of new application

•	Re-design front-end of existing application
•	Creation of operational dashboard
•	Maintenance and development on existing applications

Aboma | QlikView implementation
•	QlikView Server installation
•	Design and development of new application (customer information portal)

•	Scoping of the PoC
•	Creation of taxonomy

Infineum | Market Intelligence quick scan and tool selection

•	Market Intelligence quick scan

•	Design and development of reporting environment

Avebe | Digimind implementation

•	Source analysis 

Delta Energie | Market Intelligence quick scan

AkzoNobel | Comintelli Knowledge XChanger proof of concept
•	Design and creation of reporting environment
•	Creation of taxonomy
